text: Frantz Yvelin is the current managing director of French airline Aigle Azur, since 2017.Aigle Azur : Frantz Yvelin est nommé président Yvelin started his career in Information technology as consultant. Then, he founded two French airlines : L'Avion in 2006 and La Compagnie in 2013.Frantz Yvelin est le nouveau PDG d'Aigle Azur Also, he is a teacher in air transport at the French Civil Aviation University (Mastère Spécialisé degrees).AIGLE AZUR : Frantz Yvelin == References == Category:Living people Category:French Civil Aviation University Category:Aviation in France Category:French aviators
title: Frantz Yvelin
